title: Love Island's Lucie Donlan and Joe Garratt look loved up on luxury Falmouth trip
text:

Love Island stars Lucie Donlan and Joe Garratt have treated fans to a glimpse into their romantic getaway.

The pair both took to Instagram to boast about how their chilled out trip is helping them to cope with the stresses of their everyday lives.

They've lived busy lifestyles since leaving the Love Island villa, and judging by what the pair wrote, their retreat to Falmouth is doing the cue couple a world of good.

21 year-old blond beauty Lucie, who became well known by fans for her laid back attitude, wrote: "Sometimes the most productive thing you can do is relax...So grateful to @stmichaelsresort for having us stay with them.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

"It's been lovely to relax and spend some quality time with @josephgarratt. If you've been following my stories you'll have seen that they have everything here to take you on a journey of pure relaxation and rejuvenation."

Long haired hunk Joe, alongside a cute snap of him and Lucie cuddling, laughed: "TRTF - 'Too Relaxed To Function'. Such a nice place! Thanks for the stay guys @stmichaelsresort."

Lucie revealed back in September that she and Joe had never split up after the Love Island villa, and had been secretly dating.

(Image: Ricky Vigil/Getty Images for Boo)

(Image: ITV/REX)

Theirs wasn't a smooth path to romance though, as other boys and girls in the villa threw spanners in the works.

On Day One, Lucie chose to couple up with the sandwich maker without a second thought.

After Curtis Pritchard and Tommy Fury rocked up though, Mancunian boxer and second-place winning Tommy chose to couple up with the surfer babe.

She coupled up with Joe again, but before he was dumped from the island, he incurred the wrath of fans by telling her she shouldn't be spending so much time with Tommy.

He wanted her to be putting her time into friendships with the girls instead, which didn't go down well and had him branded controlling and manipulative.

Still, after Lucie was dumped alongside Casa Amor beau George, she seemed to find the spark with Joe again.
description: The pair took to social media to give fans a sneak peak into their quiet alone time after their lives became frantic since leaving the villa
authors: Ricky Vigil Getty Images For Boo
